name: Labyrinth
description: Labyrinth is a team-based treasure hunt where you solve puzzles and follow clues through a mobile web app, blending the thrill of a hackathon with the excitement of a race to win.

name: SSH
description: SSH is an overnight intra-college hackathon open to everyone, where you can build, showcase, and compete with your ideas and win exciting prizes, with a chance to advance to the national level(SIH).

name: @ping
description: @ping by GDSC is an immersive tech journey starting with a skill-building bootcamp and culminating in a high energy hackathon, where participants turn ideas into impactful projects.

name: Project Cycle
description: Project Cycle is where your ideas come alive, you form your own team, build something impactful, and get featured for your creation.

name: Summer Hackathon (Hack-enshmirtz)
description: Summer Hackathon (Hack-enshmirtz) is a theme-based event where you can collaborate with peers, learn new skills, and build innovative projects over the summer. The previous summer was based on the theme of Phineas and Ferb.
